ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Breaking from conventional tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A friend of mine died twice in Paw this weekend to the trains there.  Apparently, the green patrollers that don t attack you *do* aggro on you.  They go
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 6 Mar 2000, Jeff Illian wrote:
>
> My buffed charisma is 190 and I still had lament fail on me 3 times this
> past weekend in Paw, each time resulting in 5 or more MOBs... :-(. All of
> them green or blues too :-(. With the pathing in Paw, when lament fails, it
> fails BIG.

A friend of mine died twice in Paw this weekend to the trains
there. Apparently, the green patrollers that don't attack you
*do* aggro on you. They go merrily on their patrol route,
aggroing everything that's blue to you causing a hute train.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
